original_text: And when Haman saw that Mordecai bowed not, nor did him reverence, then was Haman full of wrath.
korean_text: 하만이 모르드개가 무릎을 꿇지도 아니하고 절하지도 아니함을 보고 매우 노하더니

sentences.original_text: And when Haman saw that Mordecai bowed not
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하만은 모르드개가 절하지 않은 것을 보고

sentences.original_text: then was Haman full of wrath
